title: URGENT HIRING: REAL ESTATE VIRTUAL ASSISTANT (WHOLESALING EXPERIENCE REQUIRED)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a highly skilled Real Estate Virtual Assistant to join our growing team IMMEDIATELY!

If you have experience in real estate wholesaling, thrive in a fast-paced environment, and are confident in your communication skills — we want to hear from you!

Requirements:
Excellent English communication skills (verbal & written)
Prior experience in real estate wholesaling is a MUST
Familiarity with GoHighLevel CRM (GHL) is a BIG PLUS
Own desktop/laptop and web camera
Stable and reliable internet connection
Can work U.S. business hours

Competitive pay and long-term opportunity for the right candidate!

If you meet all the requirements and are ready to hit the ground running, apply now and let's grow together!
